python 
 1"""Sample Python module for testing syntax highlighting."""
 2
 3from dataclasses import dataclass, field
 4from typing import Iterator
 5
 6
 7@dataclass
 8class TreeNode:
 9    """A node in a binary tree."""
10
11    value: int
12    left: "TreeNode | None" = None
13    right: "TreeNode | None" = None
14    tags: list[str] = field(default_factory=list)
15
16    def depth(self) -> int:
17        """Return the depth of this subtree."""
18        left_d = self.left.depth() if self.left else 0
19        right_d = self.right.depth() if self.right else 0
20        return 1 + max(left_d, right_d)
21
22    def inorder(self) -> Iterator[int]:
23        """Yield values in-order."""
24        if self.left:
25            yield from self.left.inorder()
26        yield self.value
27        if self.right:
28            yield from self.right.inorder()
29
30
31def build_tree(values: list[int]) -> TreeNode | None:
32    """Build a balanced BST from a sorted list."""
33    if not values:
34        return None
35    mid = len(values) // 2
36    return TreeNode(
37        value=values[mid],
38        left=build_tree(values[:mid]),
39        right=build_tree(values[mid + 1 :]),
40    )
41
42
43if __name__ == "__main__":
44    tree = build_tree([1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7])
45    assert tree is not None
46    print(f"Depth: {tree.depth()}")
47    print(f"In-order: {list(tree.inorder())}")
